title: In Vitro Biocompatibility and Release Characteristics of Polypyrrole-bupivacaine Coatings for Neurostimulators
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Patents and know how arising in part from Follow on Fund work purchased by US biomed company. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
findingsText: New electropolmeric systems developed which can incorporate deliverable drugs. Emphasis of Follow-on-Fund grant shifted to new coatings for stents and, in conjuction with certain biomedical companies, neural stimulators. Patents and Know how arising in part from this study were purchased by US biomedical company in 2011. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
